bit_field_value.name: XFERTYP_RSPTYP_0b11
bit_field_value.description: Response length 48, check busy after response.

bit_field_value.name: XFERTYP_CMDTYP_0b01
bit_field_value.description: Suspend CMD52 for writing bus suspend in CCCR.

bit_field_value.name: XFERTYP_CMDTYP_0b10
bit_field_value.description: Resume CMD52 for writing function select in CCCR.

bit_field_value.name: XFERTYP_CMDTYP_0b11
bit_field_value.description: Abort CMD12, CMD52 for writing I/O abort in CCCR.

bit_field_value.name: PRSSTAT_CIHB_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Can issue command using only CMD line.

bit_field_value.name: PRSSTAT_CDIHB_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Can issue command which uses the DAT line.

bit_field_value.name: PRSSTAT_CDIHB_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Cannot issue command which uses the DAT line.

bit_field_value.name: PRSSTAT_SDSTB_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Clock is changing frequency and not stable.

bit_field_value.name: PRSSTAT_BWEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Write disable, the buffer can hold valid data less than the write watermark level.

bit_field_value.name: PRSSTAT_BWEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Write enable, the buffer can hold valid data greater than the write watermark level.

bit_field_value.name: PRSSTAT_BREN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Read disable, valid data less than the watermark level exist in the buffer.

bit_field_value.name: PRSSTAT_BREN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Read enable, valid data greater than the watermark level exist in the buffer.

bit_field_value.name: PRSSTAT_CINS_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Power on reset or no card.

bit_field_value.name: PROCTL_D3CD_0b0
bit_field_value.description: DAT3 does not monitor card Insertion.

bit_field_value.name: PROCTL_CDTL_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Card detect test level is 0, no card inserted.

bit_field_value.name: PROCTL_CDTL_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Card detect test level is 1, card inserted.

bit_field_value.name: PROCTL_CDSS_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Card detection level is selected for normal purpose.

bit_field_value.name: PROCTL_CDSS_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Card detection test level is selected for test purpose.

bit_field_value.name: PROCTL_DMAS_0b00
bit_field_value.description: No DMA or simple DMA is selected.

bit_field_value.name: PROCTL_RWCTL_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Disable read wait control, and stop SD clock at block gap when SABGREQ is set.

bit_field_value.name: PROCTL_RWCTL_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Enable read wait control, and assert read wait without stopping SD clock at block gap when SABGREQ bit is set.

bit_field.name: WECINT
bit_field.description: Wakeup Event Enable On Card Interrupt

bit_field.name: WECINS
bit_field.description: Wakeup Event Enable On SD Card Insertion

bit_field.name: WECRM
bit_field.description: Wakeup Event Enable On SD Card Removal

bit_field_value.name: SYSCTL_IPGEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Bus clock will be internally gated off.

bit_field_value.name: SYSCTL_IPGEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Bus clock will not be automatically gated off.

bit_field_value.name: SYSCTL_HCKEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: System clock will be internally gated off.

bit_field_value.name: SYSCTL_HCKEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: System clock will not be automatically gated off.

bit_field_value.name: SYSCTL_PEREN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: SDHC clock will be internally gated off.

bit_field_value.name: SYSCTL_PEREN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: SDHC clock will not be automatically gated off.

bit_field.name: CEBESEN
bit_field.description: Command End Bit Error Status Enable

bit_field.name: DEBESEN
bit_field.description: Data End Bit Error Status Enable

bit_field.name: CEBEIEN
bit_field.description: Command End Bit Error Interrupt Enable

bit_field.name: DEBEIEN
bit_field.description: Data End Bit Error Interrupt Enable

bit_field_value.name: AC12ERR_AC12CE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: CRC error met in Auto CMD12 response.

bit_field_value.name: AC12ERR_AC12IE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Error, the CMD index in response is not CMD12.

bit_field.name: CNIBAC12E
bit_field.description: Command Not Issued By Auto CMD12 Error

bit_field.name: AC12NE
bit_field.description: Force Event Auto Command 12 Not Executed

bit_field.name: AC12TOE
bit_field.description: Force Event Auto Command 12 Time Out Error

bit_field.name: AC12CE
bit_field.description: Force Event Auto Command 12 CRC Error

bit_field.name: AC12EBE
bit_field.description: Force Event Auto Command 12 End Bit Error

bit_field.name: AC12IE
bit_field.description: Force Event Auto Command 12 Index Error

bit_field.name: CNIBAC12E
bit_field.description: Force Event Command Not Executed By Auto Command 12 Error

bit_field.name: CTOE
bit_field.description: Force Event Command Time Out Error

bit_field.name: CEBE
bit_field.description: Force Event Command End Bit Error

bit_field.name: DTOE
bit_field.description: Force Event Data Time Out Error

bit_field.name: DEBE
bit_field.description: Force Event Data End Bit Error

bit_field.name: ADMAES
bit_field.description: ADMA Error State (When ADMA Error Is Occurred.)

bit_field.name: EXBLKNU
bit_field.description: Exact Block Number Block Read Enable For SDIO CMD53

bit_field_value.name: VENDOR_EXBLKNU_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Exact block read for SDIO CMD53.

bit_field.name: DTOCVACK
bit_field.description: Boot ACK Time Out Counter Value

bit_field.name: AUTOSABGEN
bit_field.description: When boot, enable auto stop at block gap function. This function will be triggered, and host will stop at block gap when received card block cnt is equal to BOOTBLKCNT.

bit_field.name: BOOTBLKCNT
bit_field.description: Defines the stop at block gap value of automatic mode. When received card block cnt is equal to BOOTBLKCNT and AUTOSABGEN is 1, then stop at block gap.

bit_field_value.name: HOSTVER_SVN_0b00000001
bit_field_value.description: SD host specification version 2.0, supports test event register and ADMA.
